ai-patthana8.15:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.15:1.1_1: No Give rise to diversity of thought. Completely understanding the Teaching gives rise to diversity of defilements.
ai-patthana8.15:1.1_2: Nor do they arise because of defilements that arise for you.
ai-patthana8.15:2.1_0: Nor do they give rise to defilement.
ai-patthana8.15:3.1_0: Defiled by Defilements, natures arises dependent on the cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.15:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
